name: Ogre Battle 64: Person of Lordly Caliber
summary:
"Ogre Battle 64: Person of Lordly Caliber is a tactical RPG for the Nintendo 64.

Featuring a gripping storyline with multiple possible endings, and a genre-defining character class system, this strategic epic has rightly retained its place in the hearts of tactical RPG fans for over a decade.

The game tells the story of Magnus Gallant, a recently graduated officer of the Palatinean Army who is assigned to the troubled southern region of his native land. There he witnesses the plight of the lower classes – the victims of a tyrannical ruling elite whose only thought is for the preservation of their own lofty status. With civil war brewing, Magnus is faced with a terrible choice: to betray his own noble origins in the name of liberty, or turn a blind eye to the evils of his rotten society."

name: Ogre Battle: The March of the Black Queen
summary:
It’s up to you to defeat the Empire. It’s been nearly a quarter of a century since the Zetegenian Empire first conquered the Kingdoms of Zenobia with a wrath of fear and bloodshed.

You are the leader of a band of rebels who’ve fought to preserve the last shred of honor in this desperate time of treachery. Manage the ranks of a full-blown rebel army, complete with hundreds of characters, magic items, weapons and mystical Tarot cards. You must succeed in ousting the evil usurpers - your fate, and that of the entire population, depends on it.

name: Ogre
summary: Ogre is a 2D turn-based strategy game, and a direct computer conversion of Steve Jackson's board game of supertanks going against conventional infantry with howitzers. It plays exactly like the board game - on a hex-based board one player controls ordinary military units (soldiers, tanks etc.), and defends against the second player, who controls a supertank named "Ogre" - Ogre is very powerful, and can easily destroy normal weaponry and ground forces.

name: OGame
summary:
OGame is a strategy game set in space, with thousands of players from across the world competing at the same time. You only need a regular web browser to play.

You start out with just one undeveloped world and turn that into a mighty empire able to defend your hard earned colonies.

Create an economic and military infrastructure to support your quest for the next greatest technological achievements.

Wage war against other empires as you struggle with other players to gain the materials.
Negotiate with other emperors and create an alliance or trade for much needed resources.

Build an armada to enforce your will throughout the universe.
Hoard your resources behind an impregnable wall of planetary defences.
Whatever you wish to do, OGame can let you do it.

Will you terrorize the area around you? Or will you strike fear into the hearts of those who attack the helpless?

name: Ogre
summary:
Ogre is a turn-based strategy game of mechanized warfare, requiring tactical decision making and strategic thinking. It is the official video game adaptation of the legendary tabletop wargame from Steve Jackson Games, developed by the award-winning Auroch Digital.

Hovercraft, tanks, infantry, and giant cybernetic tanks called Ogres take part in a seemingly endless world war. You take command and vie for supremacy on the irradiated battlefields of The Last War.

name: Ogami Ichiro Funtouki: Sakura Taisen Kayou Show - Benitokage Yori
summary: An adventure game about Ogami preparing a real world Sakura Taisen stage play.

name: Ogre Battle Gaiden
summary: "Ogre Battle Gaiden: Prince of Zenobia" is a 2000 real-time tactical role-playing game developed and published by SNK for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. The game is a spin-off within the Ogre Battle series, originally created by Quest Corporation. The storyline takes place parallel to "Ogre Battle: The March of the Black Queen", and follows the path of Prince Tristan of Zenobia during his quest to reclaim his kingdom. As with other Ogre Battle titles, the player controls squads of an army, moving to different parts of the map accomplishing tasks and battling armies encountered on the route. Choices made during the narrative impact the ending.

name: Ogre's Ambition 2
summary: A role-playing game from neronsoft.

name: Ogrez
summary: Immerse yourself in the world doomed to destruction at the hands of a distraught artificial intelligence - Ogrez. To do this, you should arm yourself with perseverance, attentiveness and strong nerves - otherwise your chances are zero!

name: Ogre Tale
summary: Join ogre sisters Ran, Hana, and Yume, and their feline mentor, Iroha, in a battle against fairytale folkheroes-turned-villains via this action-packed tongue-in-cheek 2D beat-em-up romp set in modern-day Japan!

name: OGgolf
summary: Golf a full 18 hole course, over canyons, across small islands, on a mountain, at the beach, in a swamp and more!!!! 2d open world golf island with wind, sand, water hazards, rough, fairway, green & out of bounds areas.

name: Ogopogo
summary: A new concept in block-matching puzzle games. Compete for high scores and discover new gameplay twists as you journey into the depths of Okanagan Lake, searching for the legendary Ogopogo.

name: Ogu and the Secret Forest
summary: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

name: Ogre: Console Edition
summary: Ogre is a turn-based strategy game of mechanised warfare, requiring tactical decision-making and strategic thinking. It's the official video game adaptation of the legendary tabletop wargame from Steve Jackson Games, developed by the award-winning Auroch Digital.

name: OGA Oni-Gokko Royale Hunter ha Field de Koi wo Suru
summary: OGA Oni-Gokko Royale Hunter ha Field de Koi wo Suru is a game developed by Otomate and was released for Sony PlayStation Portable.

name: Ogre Chambers DX
summary: Roguelike bullet hell shooter, where you fend off waves of attacking monsters in a constantly transforming arena. You are rewarded with upgrades to your vulnerable spaceship if you survive long enough.

name: Ogo
summary: Ogo is an arcade twin-stick shooter where you control yin and yang to defeat your enemies, complete varied levels or just relax in different endless game modes.

name: Ograidet
summary:
My best friend 'killed herself'.
She didn't leave a suicide note. And yet, they concluded that's exactly the way her life ended.
She was a downer and had few friends.
But she did have a stalker. I'm sure he killed her. To prove the truth, I started my own investigation.

name: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus
summary: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: OG Memory: Kira Maus
summary: OG Memory: Kira Maus is an casual memory game with cute dog images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: OG Puzzlers: Fall 2K23
summary: OG Puzzlers: Fall 2K23 is an casual puzzel game stunning images of coloured leafs made in fall 2023. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: OG Memory: Fall 2K23
summary: OG Memory: Fall 2K23 is an casual memory game with stunning leafs images made in Fall 2023. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Oguzok Horror
summary: Oguzok needs to peel off labels from bananas! He better make it fast because chef is very angry!

summary: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters is an puzzel game with scary monsters in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

summary: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Boats is an casual puzzel game with stunning images in the synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

summary: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dragons is an puzzel game with cool dragons in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters
summary: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters/b] is an memory game with scary monster images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24
summary: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24 is an puzzel game with stunning nature pictures . You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: OG Memory: Spring 2K24
summary: OG Memory: Spring 2K24 is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Ogre Labs
summary: Ogre Labs is a single-level PWAD for Doom II by Russell Pearson. It is a very large tech-base themed map for limit removing ports and uses the Doom music track "The Imp's Song" by Robert Prince.

name: Oggy and the Cockroaches
summary: Based on the animated series OGGY that first appeared in 1999, OGGY AND THE COCKROACHES presents some role reversal with Oggy as the victim fighting off three pesky cockroaches.

name: Ogora
summary: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try to survive!

name: Ognisco
summary: Ognisco is a short (1 - 2 hours ), top-down "search action adventure" game inspired by the games of 8-bit era. Your goal is to defeat all the bosses. To do it, you need to explore the world, find new skills, upgrades and secrets. If you're nostalgic for retro gaming, Ognisco is for you!

name: Ogre Man
summary: Ogre Man is a challenging retro inspired 2d Action Platformer. You get to pick the order of the levels, and earn new abilities from defeated bosses. It has fun original characters and music.

name: Ogiri Adventure Game
summary: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Vampires
summary: OG Memory: Synthwave Vampires is an memory game with scary Vampires in an stunning synthwave style. You have to find the same correct pairs to completle the game in as few rounds as possible. Find all of the pairs to get a new try and beat your record.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Vampires
summary: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Vampires is an puzzel game with scary Vampires in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Ogrüuk
summary: Ogrüuk is a 3D platformer stealth game where ogres have captured all your dogs! You must save them before their cooking pot is at the right temperature! Sneak between monsters and keep away from their lights or you'll also be their dinner!

name: Ogantto
summary: oGANTTo is a deck-building strategy game set on a gantt chart. Manage employees and techniques to optimize your supply chain and maximize revenue.

name: Ogopogo
summary: Embark on an adventure as the legendary Ogopogo, navigating through captivating maze-like landscapes. Unlock achievements along the way, celebrating your progress and mastery of the game.

name: Ogre Chambers 2222
summary: A ROGUELIKE, where you FIND and FUSE ABILITIES, while raiding TRANSFORMING space ARENAS  Traverse randomized planets - Murder their populations - Get stronger - Take down Ogre Overlords!  But remember, DO NOT anger the ogres beyond your guns' capabilities!

name: Ogrewatch
summary: Shoot Ogres and race to upgrade your base and equipment before getting overrun. Discover ancient secrets to unlock more powerful weapons and find the key to your survival.

name: Og Frog Fr
summary: A platformer where you play as Ogie the Frog and must use your jump strength precisely. Either master your jumps to race to the finish line, or to help critters and collect gems along the way.

name: Ogu and the Secret Forest: Winter Festival Blast
summary: Embark on an adventure to Winter Festival Island with Baby Ogu! Find the missing village chief and uncover the secrets hidden on the island. Includes a 1v1 local tennis battle game.
